english.segment1: . I dont think my heart can take it. Another empty day might break it. I need you more than ever before. I found out what it is Im missing
english.segment3: I know your heart can barely take it. To see me grab this day and break it. I need you more than ever before. I found out what it is Im missing
english.segment4: You be the psalm writer. And I will be your psalm. You be the songwriter. And I will sing your song
